item.title: Cover image showcase
item.description: {{% wide-image src=“https://github.com/kkuom/SecondSouffle/blob/master/docs/img/Premier_Souffle.png?raw=true" title=“Le premier souffle” %}} Pièces jointes Informations Langue {{% button href=“https://www.dropbox.com/s/zc22bb8bbg8p2nt/Le%20premier%20souffle%20-%20pages.pdf?dl=0" icon=“fa fa-download” %}}Page par page{{% /button %}} PDF (12 pages A5), 123ko Français {{% button href=“https://www.dropbox.com/s/mv4lshzqezizwn5/Le%20premier%20souffle%20-%20planches.pdf?dl=0" icon=“fa fa-download” %}}Planche par planche{{% /button %}} PDF (7 planches A4), 143ko Français {{% button href=“https://www.dropbox.com/s/xk7ubtq6cqvvq1j/Le%20premier%20souffle%20-%20cahier.pdf?dl=0" icon=“fa fa-download” %}}Livret recto/verso{{% /button %}} PDF (6 planches A4), 106ko Français
